# Wardyń Dolny

Wardyń Dolny  () is a settlement in the administrative district of Gmina Połczyn-Zdrój, within Świdwin County, West Pomeranian Voivodeship, in north-western Poland. It lies approximately  west of Połczyn-Zdrój,  east of Świdwin, and  north-east of the regional capital Szczecin.
For the history of the region, see History of Pomerania.
The settlement has a population of 200.
